name: Joaquín Fernández
aboutMeDescription: 👨‍💻 Software Developer with more than 7 years of experience in web-based scalable applications, especially in financial sector. Expert in JavaScript, React and best practices 🚀. Skilled in quality assurance, testing 🧪 and good development practices ✅.
projectsDescription: These are some of the projects I developed using modern and good practices.
calendarAppDescription: A calendar web application for keeping your agenda, managing your events and meetings. Allows you to create events, edit them and delete them.
journalAppDescription: A personal journal for the day, allows you to create, edit and delete entries. You can also store images thanks to Cloudinary.
heroesAppDescription: A simple app that lists Marvel and DC heroes, allows you to search by name and offers a detailed view of each hero.
contactMeDescription:
🚀 Are you looking for a technical profile with focus on quality and teamwork?
I design and implement modern web solutions, with a focus on long-term and collaborative success.
If you think I can help you or your project, don't hesitate to send me a message.
messagePlaceholder: What can I help you with?
errorMessage: Something went wrong 😕. Check your data and try again. If the error persists, you can send me a message directly to: 📧 joaquin.fernandez.dev@gmail.com
successMessage: I'll get back to you as soon as possible ⏳
thanksMessage: Thanks for exploring my work! 🤝 Let's keep in touch.
footerText: Made with 💻, ☕ and passion for code.
